autoFillControls.upload_instructions_desc1: Upload a JSON or CSV file to import orders in bulk. Missing date/time data will be automatically filled with current Hong Kong date/time.

batchUploadModel.error_maps_not_loaded: Google Maps is not loaded. Please try again.
batchUploadModel.error_no_valid_orders: No valid orders found in the file
batchUploadModel.error_geocoder_not_available: Google Maps geocoder not available. Please try again.

fileUploader.error_file_type: Only JSON and CSV files are allowed
fileUploader.success_file_select: File selected, please click the upload button
fileUploader.text_drag_prompt: Click or drag JSON/CSV file to this area to upload
fileUploader.text_hint: Upload a JSON or CSV file to import orders in bulk.

uploadPreview.alert_geocode_failure_desc_part1: The following {{count}} address(es) failed geocoding and will be skipped:
uploadPreview.alert_invalid_date_desc_part1: The following {{count}} row(s) had invalid date formats and will be skipped. Only YYYY-MM-DD format is accepted (e.g., 2025-01-20):
uploadPreview.alert_auto_fill_desc_part1: The following orders had missing date/time data that was auto-filled with your defaults:
uploadPreview.alert_no_data_desc: No customers or orders can be created from the uploaded file.
